TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_nipaluma-bakung,bakong, title = nipaluma-bakung,bakong, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/nipaluma-bakung,bakong} }

S.FORM: == bakung, bakong == u siwkay nu nipaluma bakung, bakong namauzip i Yaco caledesay a subal. mauzip tu i sadipan nu bayu'. u yadah a mihca ku uzip. takalaw ku kidu. u sanek nu nipaluma malaheci tu imelang pasubana i cacudadan a lacul u zuma a cidekay a kamu, saungay misapayu' a cidekay u sulit nu zuma a kamu u sulit nu Hulam 文殊蘭 wenshulan u sulit nu Lipun u sulit nu Amilika

== bakong, bakong == o siwkay no nipaloma bakong, bakong namaozip i Yaco caledesay a sobal. maozip to i sadipan no bayo'. o yadah a mihca ko ozip. takalaw ko kido. o sanek no nipaloma malaheci to imelang pasobana i cacodadan a lacol o zoma a cidekay a kamo, saongay misapayo' a cidekay o solit no zoma a kamo o solit no Holam 文殊蘭 wensholan o solit no Lipon o solit no Amilika
